title: When are borders and such comming out for season 7 ranks?
body: I finished in Silver 5 the DAY before ranked ended (6th of November) however i haven't received the silver border, i know i wont get the ward reward due to only being ranked in solo/duo and not flex as well however, but. just wondering about when they are sent out or if for some reason i didn't receive mine as i got into the rank so late

replies.body: Does anyone know if we are getting division specific borders like last year? Or just borders that show your tier?
Usually takes some time after the end of the season. Be patient im sure you will get your reward soon enough.
cheers guys, i just wasn't sure about it
you usually get it like a week or so after season ends
